text: Czesław Olech (May 22, 1931 – July 1, 2015) was a Polish mathematician. He was a representative of the Kraków school of mathematics, especially the differential equations school of Tadeusz Ważewski. ==Some of his works== *A talk on the occasion of receiving an honorary degree.
